content: Is this where SMART backend topics go or is there another place?
That would depend on what you mean by SMART Backend :)

Haha I see what you did there, I mean https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/authorization/index.html, which I guess it would. One thing I noticed while digging into the spec: "typ" header param says "required" but RFC for JWT says optional. Does SMART backend require it while the underlying RFC 7519 does not, or is this an error? None of the BDT auth tests look for it...
